scripts.build-interfaces: cd packages/libreplex-idls && yarn package && yarn build && cd .. && cd libreplex-sdk && yarn build && cd ../..
scripts.build: lerna run clean && lerna run build
scripts.libreplex_liquidity:deploy:mainnet: anchor build -p libreplex_liquidity&& anchor deploy -p libreplex_liquidity --provider.cluster https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/libreplex-deployer.json
scripts.libreplex_inscriptions:deploy:eclipse-te: anchor build -p libreplex_inscriptions && anchor deploy -p libreplex_inscriptions --provider.cluster https://testnet.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/libreplex-deployer.json
scripts.libreplex_inscriptions:deploy:localnet: anchor build -p libreplex_inscriptions && anchor deploy -p libreplex_inscriptions --provider.cluster http://localhost:8899 --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/libreplex-deployer.json
